subject: Colleges and Universities
Hiring and Promotion
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Tony Bennett, who led Washington State to the postseason in each of his three years with the basketball program, was hired by Virginia, according to Jim Sterk, the athletic director at Washington State. Bennett will replace Dave Leitao, who was 63-60 in four seasons but resigned after the Cavaliers finished 10-18. Bennett, 39, was 68-30 in three seasons with the Cougars, and was the Associated Press coach of the year in 2007. ¶Ohio State said it sold the rights for its sports programs to IMG College and RadiOhio in a 10-year deal that guarantees the university $110 million. Buckeyes (AP).
